short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create a new Google Doc, Sheet, Presentation, Drawing, or Form directly from your browser bar with one click. Open Drive or Keep.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate your productivity with this essential Chrome extension that allows you to create new Google Docs, Sheets, Presentations, Drawings, and Forms directly from your browser bar with just a single click. This extension is a time-saver for users who frequently work with Google Workspace, as it streamlines the process of creating new documents, spreadsheets, presentations, drawings, and forms.

Key Features:

Quick Access: Access Google Workspace creation tools directly from your browser bar, eliminating the need to navigate through multiple menus or tabs.

One-Click Creation: Create new Google Docs, Sheets, Presentations, Drawings, and Forms with a single click, saving you valuable time and effort.

Effortless Navigation: Quickly open Google Drive or Google Keep with this extension, allowing you to manage your files and notes efficiently.

Seamless Integration: This extension seamlessly integrates with your existing Google Workspace account, ensuring that all your created documents are saved to your account and easily accessible.

Customizable: Customize the extension to suit your preferences, allowing you to choose which Google Workspace tools you want to have quick access to from your browser bar.

Free and Secure: This extension is free to use and is secure, as it only requires access to your Google Workspace account to function.

Cross-Platform Compatibility: This extension is compatible with all major web browsers, including Google Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, and Safari, ensuring that you can use it on any device.

User-Friendly Interface: The extension has a clean and intuitive interface, making it easy to use, even for those who are not tech-savvy.

Privacy and Data Protection: This extension respects your privacy and data protection. It only accesses the necessary information to function and does not collect any additional data without your consent.

Regular Updates: The extension is regularly updated to ensure that it continues to function properly and to add new features and improvements based on user feedback.

With this Chrome extension, you can boost your productivity and streamline your workflow, allowing you to focus on what matters most. Try it out today and see the difference it can make in your daily workflow.
